subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|火|然|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=fire}} – burn with fire. Originally {{och-l|然}}, but because it was phonetically borrowed for abstract senses, {{m|zh|火}} was added for differentiation.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[burn]]; to be [[alight]]
# to [[ignite]]; to [[light]]
# to [[spark]] off (hopes); to [[start]] (debate); to [[raise]] (hopes)
